is a small mountain village in Vinje,

. Haukeli is home to a wide range of services for visitors to the area. During winter, the Haukelifjell mountains are beautiful and wild. You will find everything from rugged mountains to sheltered birch forests, and its quite commom to meet flocks of wild reindeer. If you are after peace and quiet, there are large areas where hardly anyone goes. Haukeli is also a gateway to the skiing trails to

over Haukeli and see a beautiful mountain area. If you take the old road instead for the tunnel it would be a nice experience. There is a sign where you can drive. The road is slim so drive safe.

that has a familyprofile. With 4 lifts and a magic carpet and lots of space off piste. There are lot of opportunities for rent of cabins and apartments in the middle of the skicenter. is one of the most snow guaranteed destinations in Norway. A unique location, protected by Haukelifjells amazing mountain chains, but at the same time close to the giant nature park Hardangervidda

In Edland there are several shops, during summertime there are also many tents with local an nonlocal things to buy.

In Vågslid there is Arbuvollen Fjellbutikk that sells food, fishing card and lots of other things. There are also an tourist information there and fast food.
Haukeliseter Fjellstue or Vågslidtun Hotel has a wonderful meny. Haukelifjell Ski Center has only fast food / cafe in Tyrvelidhallen.
After Ski at the ski center

In Vågslid there is a lot of nice and modern apartments with ski in ski out. The view is magnificent and there is cross country tracks just a few meters from the apartments. This is a winter El Dorado!
